name: K-array Mastiff KM112P
headline: Compact 12" Mastiff wedge for modern stages
description: Mastiff KM112P is a compact 12-inch stage monitor that keeps vocals and instruments sitting effortlessly on top of the mix, even on loud stages.
story: Built for touring engineers who want a low-profile wedge that still bites, KM112P combines a fast, articulate midrange with controlled low end so performers hear exactly what they need without washing the stage.
definition: 12" active Mastiff stage monitor with high headroom and tight, vocal-forward response.
finish: Touring black polyurea with steel grille
drivers: 12" low-frequency driver with coaxial high-frequency section
specs: 12" coaxial-style driver layout for point-source monitoring
Active amplification with DSP presets for vocal, band and DJ wedges
Low-profile cabinet geometry to keep sightlines clear
Road-ready finish and hardware for touring use
Multiple pole, floor and bracket mounting options
coverage: Asymmetrical wedge pattern tailored to performer zone

lifestyle.alt: Mastiff KM112P as vocal wedge on stage
Mastiff KM112P close-up grille and logo
Mastiff KM112P on a live show riser

name: K-array Mastiff KM312P
headline: Flagship triple-12" Mastiff for arena stages
description: Mastiff KM312P is a large-format wedge that delivers huge headroom and authority for rock stages, drum risers and high-SPL monitoring.
story: When artists demand the feel of a PA in front of them, KM312P steps in. Multiple 12-inch drivers and focused horn loading keep the sound tight and controlled, even when the monitor mix gets aggressive.
definition: Large-format active Mastiff monitor with triple 12" engine for high-SPL stages.
finish: Flagship touring black with reinforced hardware
drivers: Triple 12" low-frequency section with dedicated HF horn
specs: Triple 12" configuration for massive headroom and impact
Active multi-channel amplification with DSP presets
Voiced for drum, bass and high-energy artist mixes
Cabinet angles optimised for nearfield and backline use
Heavy-duty hardware for touring and rental fleets
coverage: Focused wedge pattern for powerful on-axis response

lifestyle.alt: Mastiff KM312P as drum wedge on riser
Mastiff KM312P side view showing cabinet profile

name: K-array Turtle KRM33P
headline: Ultra-low-profile monitor that disappears on stage
description: Turtle KRM33P is a low-profile, high-clarity stage monitor that all but disappears to cameras and audience sightlines while keeping artists fully locked to the mix.
story: Designed for broadcast stages, theatres and premium venues, KRM33P hugs the stage edge with a shallow footprint, providing precise coverage without visually dominating the set.
definition: Ultra-low-profile active monitor for theatre, broadcast and high-end stages.
finish: Immersive matte black with discreet form factor
drivers: Slim multi-driver array with integrated amplification and DSP
specs: Low-profile chassis designed to vanish from camera and audience sightlines
Integrated amplification with DSP presets for speech, vocal and band mixes
Tight pattern control to focus energy on the performer zone
Multiple mounting and coupling options for creative staging
Ideal where visuals and clean lines are as important as sound

lifestyle.alt: Turtle KRM33P on theatre stage front edge
Turtle KRM33P in broadcast or TV studio
Turtle KRM33P discreet monitor on corporate stage
